misc: Appreciates the thoughtful course designs of Kosti Kuronen who passed away in 2024
biography: Ofri, a familiar face from Golf Pirkkala, hails from the vibrant city of Tampere, Finland. Known for his composed demeanor on the course, Ofri brings a strategic approach to the game, carefully analyzing each challenge before executing his play.

Hector Trophée 2025 will mark Ofri's third appearance at the prestigious tournament. While the coveted Hector Trophée and Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, his dedication to improvement suggests that he may one day be a formidable opponent.

Off the course, Ofri is known to be a thoughtful individual. He has often expressed his appreciation for the thoughtful course designs of the late Kosti Kuronen, whose work has left a lasting impression on the Finnish golfing landscape.
